featuredPost.title: 25 Ideas for a Healthy and Beautiful Living Room
featuredPost.author: Agustin Lleras
featuredPost.content: With the help of our sponsor, **Furnitures R Us**, we take you through the process of turning a simple space into a cozy ambient where the family can hang out. This weekly special shows all the tips and trips to keep it simple, but end up with wonderful results. All within a budget!

posts.title: How To Budget For Your New Home
posts.author: Rafael Lleras
posts.content: The real estate market moves in a cycle, so when the market is up or down, focusing on saving money is key.

posts.title: 4 Best States for New Buyers
posts.author: Agustin Lleras
posts.content: These states provide the lowest property tax and greatest opportunity for growth, with a vibrant community.

posts.title: What's the Real Cost of a Home Purchase?
posts.author: Christina Jacobs
posts.content: Purchasing a home is not only the down-payment and the mortgage. Banks, real estate agents, documents cost money too.

posts.title: 5 Things to Avoid When Closing
posts.author: Maritza Sandrea
posts.content: We'll tell you how to avoid these common mistakes that could end up costing you thousands.

posts.title: Rent or Purchase? 2022's Dilemma
posts.author: Agustin Lleras
posts.content: Rent is up everywhere in the world. Is it really still the safe bet?
